title: Stuck on Authenticating, Help!!!
body: Im stuck on Authenticating cant log in. This started yesterday and still happening today. Redownloaded the client with the hextech support system but nothing seems to work. Please help its my weekend and i want to game!!

replies.body: Hey, getting stuck at authentication is usually caused by a connection blocking your from communicating with out servers and less likely a reinstall issue.  You'll want to run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  I also recommend using the hextech repair tool you downloaded to auto-configure your firewall settings which should help with some of these blocks.
